sub_title: Master data Manager at Royal IHC Service
summary: Since 2014 my career focusses on Master Data activities, which has become a passion for me. I had the opportunity to work with multi skilled teams based across various countries. I have been able to use my knowledge and experience to help the companies I worked for to improve their Master Data activities and support harmonization and correct data access. Over the years I build up a vast experience in data & team management. All roles required a strong ability to be problem solving, manage complex situations and lead teams to success. What appealed to me about my roles is that it required me to be creative, social and interactive, manage teams and be highly self-starting and persistent.

profile_positions.description: In addition to my roll I am also appointed as Operation Lead implementation WMS, TMS, and Customs Management Platform. In this project we do a full replacement of existing technology with customer specific technology.
profile_positions.title: Operation Lead implementation WMS, TMS, and Customs Management Platform.

profile_positions.description:
CEVA Logistics is a global logistics and supply chain company in both freight management and contract logistics with US$12 billion in revenues. Its head office is in Marseille, France, and it was founded in 2007, as a merger of TNT Logistics and EGL Eagle Global Logistics.

In my role as Contract Manager C, I am responsible for our client Uniqlo, which is Japanese casual wear designer, manufacturer and retailer. From the European Distribution Centre, I report directly to the Site Manager and lead a team consisting of transport experts and customer service specialists. Next to this I am accountable for the following activities:

Developing and managing the service contract related to warehousing, transport and customs activities,
Managing the operational and financial risks for the client,
Maintain the contract in relation to client and market developments,
Coordinating of activities to ensure full service for the client,
Maintaining complex client relationships,
Bring efficiency improvements,
Management reporting to Site Management and client,
Analyse reported issues and bring improvement measures,
Daily management of departments responsible for Warehouse, Customer Service, Transport, Invoicing and, inbound & outbound handling, 
Managing the Operations Manager, Supervisors and indirect staff > 100 FTE
Accountable for customer portfolio with turnover of  10 million
profile_positions.title: Contract manager

profile_positions.description:
Royal IHC is active in four areas: shipbuilding, offshore, mining and foundation techniques. Customers include dredging companies, shipping companies, oil and gas companies, offshore contractors and construction companies. 

Since October 2019, the Master Data organization is transformed into a shared service organization. This means that we now provide our services to all business units in Royal IHC. In my role as Shared Service Master Data Manager, I am responsible for a team of 9 master data experts and 17 master data engineers. of which 9 are in the Nederland and 7 master data engineers are in Malaysia and 10 master data engineers are in Croatia. This team ensures data harmonization and governance. As a team we are responsible for the data related to parts, suppliers and customers. 

Over the past years I spend much of my time to professionalize the Master Data processes and procedures. Furthermore, I created and introduced management tools to support the processes better and allow to make decisions based on data insights. There improved processes and tools have helped IHC to facilitate data quality standards across the company and monitor productivity & quality standards of my team. As an example, I introduced the Master Data Maturity Quadrant, which measures the data management maturity of the various business units relevant to each other. This tools helps to easily assess which steps need to be taken to lift the data maturity of a business unit to the desired level.  

Most of my time I spend on coaching my team, ensuring service & quality levels are met and data analysis processes. As a shared service organization, we work for our business units based on mutually agreed service level agreements and defined KPI’s. 

An important activity of the Master Data team is to create analysis tools and dashboards for the end-users.
profile_positions.title: Shared Service Master data manager at Royal IHC  (CORE RESPONSIBILITY)

profile_positions.description: The implementation of the IFS Enterprise Resource Planning system within IHC, has had a major impact on all parts of the operation. During the implementation I was responsible for advising on and setting up the data structures and perform data validation activities. As Master Data subject matter expert, I am involved on an ongoing basis to support the correct setup and maintenance of the data structure in IFS.
profile_positions.title: Streamleader Implementation ERP IFS at Royal IHC Service and IHC Dregde Equipment

profile_positions.description:
“One Maritime Data Standard" is a strategic pilot of IHC, Boskalis, Damen, Van Oord, 2BA and Key Suppliers with the aim to reduce unnecessary transaction costs in the supply chain of shipbuilders, ship owners and suppliers, thus enhancing the competitiveness of the Dutch maritime industry. The objective of One Maritime Data Standard is to reduce administrative waste, increase the value by improving the supply chain process. This is achieved by using correct data across platforms for assets and maintenance systems, supplier platforms, portals and web applications, manufacturer platforms, portals and web applications.

My role as Project Manager (PM) for the One Maritime Standard, is fulfilled next to my core task as Master Data Manager. As PM I support and advise the project team with regards to the possibilities, scope and planning of One Maritime Standard. Furthermore, I develop the data strategy for the project and support the planning and budgeting for the project.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager One Maritime Standard for Royal IHC, Damen, Van Oord, Boskalis

profile_positions.description:
In my role as Master Data Manager Service, was responsible for a team of 8 master data experts in the business unit Service. Together with this team, we ensured data harmonization and governance within Service. On a daily basis I instructed and coached the team and monitored progress. Next to that I was responsible for structuring the data strategy and related monitoring and reporting tools using the PowerBI business intelligence tool.

During my first years as Master Data Manager, I spend most of my time to build up a professional master data organization, which was an under-developed area of activity in Royal IHC. A large part of the focus was on creating new master data processes and procedures and train the organization on these. Ensuring that a professional team would be build up, that could deliver consistent and high-quality data services to Royal IHC stakeholders was one of my main goals.
profile_positions.title: Master Data Manager Services Royal IHC

profile_positions.description:
Forever Direct EU BV is the EMEA Distribution organization of the Aloe Vera giant Forever Living Products. From its distribution & fulfillment center in Oud Gastel, The Netherlands, Forever Direct serves clients in over 99 countries.Forever Direct EU BV is the EMEA Distribution organization of the Aloe Vera giant Forever Living Products. From its distribution & fulfilment center in Oud Gastel, The Netherlands, Forever Direct serves clients in over 99 countries.

In the function of Master Data Manager, I was responsible for setting up, maintaining, enhancing, supporting and disclosing the Master Data process and the related reports. While working with multi-functional teams in the distribution center, clients and the US based parent company a robust and scalable process was established. In an extreme client focused company, executing on a Service Excellence strategy, the pressure on having timely, correct and complete product data available is critical.

During my period as Master Data Manager, I’ve been responsible for structuring and creating the Master Data sets for all 99 countries that were migrated to be replenished and/or served from the central distribution center. Amongst others, these migrations required complex data structuring projects in Manhattan and IFS, for which I was responsible.
profile_positions.title: Master Data Manager at Forever Direct EU B.V.

profile_positions.description:
Forever Direct EU BV is the EMEA Distribution organization of the Aloe Vera giant Forever Living Products. From its distribution & fulfilment center in Oud Gastel, The Netherlands, Forever Direct serves clients in over 99 countries.

The complex Forever Living Products distribution channel relies heavily on Value Added Services (VAS) to meet local regulatory, and client demands. This required the setup of a flexible set of VAS activities. The  EMEA logistics centralization strategy through the Distribution Center resulted in further professionalization of the Procurement, Inventory & Value-Added Services (PIV) department. 

In my role as 'Procurement Inventory & Value-Added Service Professional', I was responsible for optimizing a portfolio of items (Local 4 Local), in accordance with the established guidelines ex Forever Direct inventory availability. The planning of VAS activities for a rolling 30-day stock availability was a key task which I conducted to secure the successful execution of the strategy ex Forever Direct. Selecting, maintaining, evaluating and awarding contracts to suppliers was included in my tasks and responsibilities.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Inventory & Vas Profesional at Fover Direct EU BV

profile_positions.description:
“De Luchtballon” is a non-profit foundation that organizes holidays for children and young people up to the age of 18 with respiratory and skin diseases such as asthma, food allergy and eczema. The foundation aims, through the therapeutic nature of the holidays, to increase the self-reliance of the participants and to stimulate contact with others. In addition, “De Luchtballon” opens its grounds to other target groups that want to make use of the accommodation. “De Luchtballon” is annually visited by approximately 12,500 children from the Netherlands and Belgium. For the older participants, holidays are also organized in Davos, Switzerland.

As facility manager I was responsible for managing all daily tasks and guide teams & suppliers in organizing the various activities. My role included a wide scope of operational and management tasks. The job was very rewarding due to the close co-operation with highly motivated and passioned people, with the sole aim to make children’s lives a little easier for a short while.
profile_positions.title: Stichting  ‘De Luchtballon’ – Facility Manager

profile_positions.location: Bergen Op Zoom en omgeving, Nederland
profile_positions.description:
GOM is part of the largest facilitator of the Netherlands, the French Facilicom. GOM (Buildings Maintenance Society), which provides facility management tasks for a wide range of organizations active in various branches and employs over 8,000 employees. For Philip Morris at Bergen op Zoom, I fulfilled the function of 'Facility Project Leader'. Philip Morris is a worldwide manufacturer of cigarettes and has worldwide factories. Philip Morris had outsourced a large part of its facility management tasks to GOM, which made my core task & responsibility to steer and guide 90 GOM employees.

My role as facility project leader gave me the opportunity to act as a highly hands-on team lead. On a daily basis rotating groups of staff needed to be scheduled, instructed, coached and monitored. In this role I learned how to work with groups of people from different backgrounds while meeting tight deadlines. My natural organizational skills and hard-working mentality fit very well with the job. The function showed me that I am able to work towards results, while motivating and training people to give their best.
profile_positions.title: Facility Project Leader
